alert.note: Alert for Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:38PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Adams and south central Lincoln Counties through 315 PM PDT... At 237 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Ritzville, or 33 miles east of Moses Lake. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jantz, and Schoonover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
